page.title: 10LEISURE AND ARTS
page.content: In Chester-le-Street there are a variety of leisure activities.There are riding stables a few miles away near Stanley and Penshaw.The local swimming pool holds galas and has a successful club.At Park View Community Centre there are many sporting, cultural and educational activities such as trampolining, holiday French, keep fit,art and five-a-side.The annual Chester-le-Street Road Run is 6.2 miles long and many participants belong to the local Harriers running club. There are a choice of arts in the town including a theatre group which puts on a show in February,May and September each year.The operatic society is 82 years old and puts on fund raising musicals and concerts. There are 80 members and 20-40 perform on stage.
